cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.6)
add_subdirectory(cmu_grapheme_lang)
add_subdirectory(cmu_grapheme_lex)
add_subdirectory(cmu_indic_lang)
add_subdirectory(cmu_indic_lex)
add_subdirectory(cmu_time_awb)
add_subdirectory(cmu_us_awb)
add_subdirectory(cmu_us_kal)
add_subdirectory(cmu_us_kal16)
add_subdirectory(cmu_us_rms)
add_subdirectory(cmu_us_slt)
add_subdirectory(cmulex)
add_subdirectory(usenglish)
